name: Day Of The Platformer
description: Day of the Platformer is a short platformer about a skeleton who had died years ago. Not to fear, Day Of The Dead is here! He awakens from his grave, and his body has decayed, so that's why we called him Mr Skele, haha so funny lmao. He must traverse the small town of his childhood and make it to his party! Lets hope he doesn't get burnt to a crisp whilst trying to get there.
